pages.text: 55|68|Zai na liang zuo leyuan li, you shuiguo, you hai zao, you shiliu.
55|69|Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
55|70|Zai naxie leyuan li, you xuduo xianshu jiali de nuzi.
55|71|Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
55|72|Tamen shi baixi de, shi zheju yu zhangmu zhong de.
55|73|Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
55|74|Zai tamen de qi zi zhiqian, renhe ren huo jingling, dou weiceng yu tamen jiaojieguo.
55|75|Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
55|76|Tamen kao zai cuilu de zuo ru he meili de hua tan shang.
55|77|Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
55|78|Duo fu zai, ni ju zunyan he da de de zhu de ming hao!
56|1|Dang na jian dashi fasheng de shihou,
56|2|meiyou renhe ren fouren qi fasheng.
56|3|Na jian dashi jiang shi neng shi ren jiangji, neng shi ren shengji de;
56|4|dang da di zhendang,
56|5|shanluan fensui,
56|6|hua wei sanman de chen'ai,
56|7|er nimen fen wei san deng de shihou.
56|8|Xingfu zhe, xingfu zhe shi hedeng de ren?
56|9|Boming zhe, boming zhe shi hedeng de ren?
56|10|Zui xianxing shan zhe, shi zui xianru leyuan de ren,
56|11|zhe deng ren, que shi meng zhu juangu de.
56|12|Tamen zai enze de leyuan zhong.
56|13|Xuduo qian ren
56|14|he shaoshu hou ren,
56|15|zai zhubao xiang cheng de chuangta shang,
56|16|Bici xiangdui di kao zai shangmian.
